body: Hello, we hope you are enjoying the new update; however, we have been receiving quite a bit of stick today regarding some bugs in game, we are completely aware of the issue and hopefully we will be able to solve it soon. As of now, we would like you enjoy Avicus and it's new update to it's full capacity. If you do find more bugs be sure to report it to github (https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues) ASAP in order for it to be fixed. We just released the update so bugs are bound to happen, bear with us please!
